body.p: Although the particular focus of management commentary will depend on the facts and circumstances of the entity, management commentary should include information that is essential to an understanding of:

li.p: management’s objectives and its strategies for meeting those objectives;
the entity’s most significant resources, risks and relationships;
the results of operations and prospects; and
the critical performance measures and indicators that management uses to evaluate the entity’s performance against stated objectives.
